global_notes: Surface baseline groups G1 and G2 match results exactly. G1: total mortality rate (DiD). G2: age-specific mortality rates (7 age groups). run_026 and run_030 are near-duplicates (same results, different base_col label in cvj); both valid but flagged. No reassignment needed.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: ATT: Effect of Lancashire Cotton Famine exposure on total mortality rate in cotton-dependent vs non-cotton districts. TWFE DiD with district and period FE, population weights, clustered at district.
baseline_groups.notes: run_001 = Table 2 Col 1 (no controls), run_002 = Col 2 (density, pop shares, region x period FE), run_003 = Col 3 (adds nearby district spillover rings). All positive and significant. Coefficients ~2.0-2.5 deaths per 1000.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: ATT: Age-decomposed effect of Cotton Famine on mortality by age group. TWFE DiD with full controls, population weights by age group, clustered at district.
baseline_groups.notes: 7 baselines for age groups: under15 (coef=0.22, p=0.84, NS), 15-24 (coef=0.17, p=0.76, NS), 25-34 (coef=0.89, p=0.19, NS), 35-44 (coef=1.51, p=0.11, NS), 45-54 (coef=3.07, p=0.005, sig), 55-64 (coef=6.74, p<0.001, sig), over64 (coef=13.48, p<0.001, sig). Monotonically increasing with age.
